title: Palm Tree
description: Balancing, Standing, Warm-ups Primary body parts engaged Ankles, Chest, Quadriceps, Shoulders, Upper Back & Lower Traps, Wrists Stretches abdominal organs Improves physical and mental balance How to perform Palm Tree Stand with your feet hip-width apart. Rest your hands on top of your head with an exhale, fingers interlocked. Reach your palms toward the sky with an inhale. Come on to your toes and stretch your whole body.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
